short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get to know colors and fonts from inspiring websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired Design is a must-have Chrome extension for designers, developers, and creatives who want to uncover the secrets behind beautifully designed websites. With a single click, you can:

Extract Colors Used: Identify the main colors used on any webpage, complete with their HEX codes and usage percentages.
Discover Fonts Used: Find out the primary fonts utilized on a site, displayed in their actual styles.
Copy Colors and Fonts: Copy individual colors, fonts, or all extracted information to your clipboard effortlessly.
Simple and Clean Interface: Navigate a sleek popup that provides all results in an organized, visually appealing format.
Whether you're a designer seeking inspiration, a developer analyzing branding choices, or a curious browser user, Inspired Design simplifies your creative process by making web design details accessible.

Key Features:

Extract dominant colors with HEX codes and usage percentages.
Discover the primary fonts, styled as they appear on the webpage.
Copy results for use in your projects with a single click.
Clean, intuitive, and user-friendly interface.
Unlock the design potential of any website with Inspired Design â€“ where inspiration meets simplicity. Try it today!
